name: Bullet Bounce
description:
Shoot your own shots with other shots without shooting yourself.

Charge shots before you shoot. Bigger shots are worth more points and move faster. Shots can only be destroyed by a shot the same size or smaller. Hit a big shot with another big shot to clear the screen. 

Another little Pico-8 experiment. Tried to create something a bit more polished and complete than my previous Pico-8 things. 

Controls

Left/right - rotate

Up - accelerate

Z - hold to charge, release to shoot
